game.name: Angry Infinite Runner A Survival Run with Dragon
game.description:
You are a brave soldier who is continuously chasing a by a dangerous and hungry dragon. The only way to escape from the deadly monster is to keep running over the track that is full of obstacles. Yes! Do everything you can do to keep your character away from the unwanted problems. Run fast and try to make him jump, run, spin and win in Angry Infinite Runner A Survival Run With Dragon! Jump or move two sides to avoid the obstacles safely!

Do not forget to collect gold and also try to grab the special objects through which you will get a chance to run the longer distance. Run through the stately castles, enigmatic jungles, mysterious undersea scenes and deadly traps in the cliffs in this html5 adventure game! Face off the challenges like ice and fire with full of confidence to stay in the game for long! Try to run for as long as you can to create your best new score in this brand-new racing challenge!

Keep your eyes on the road to monitor it closely to avoid hindrances along the way! We know that you have the skill to get participated and win this adventurous run and prove the world that you are a best runner of this planet. Remember the path is full of unlimited action and suspense and your quick senses will guide you through the multiple obstacles with ease. Check out more tricky and addictive action-packed adventure games for boys that are playable on atmegame.com for free without download! Give them a single try to know them better!
